TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi User extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供目前使用者相關資訊的存取。

span.span: Provides access to the information about the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公開屬性和方法所`My.User`物件提供存取目前使用者的相關資訊。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to the information about the current user. 「 目前使用者 」 的意義與 Windows 及 Web 應用程式之間稍有不同。The meaning of "current user" differs slightly between Windows and Web applications. 在 Windows 應用程式中，目前使用者是執行應用程式的使用者。In a Windows application, the current user is the user who runs the application. Web 應用程式中目前的使用者是存取應用程式的使用者。In a Web application, the current user is the user who accesses the application. `My.User`屬性也可存取目前的使用者。The `My.User` property also provides access to the for the current user. 主體的物件代表使用者的安全性內容，包括該使用者的識別以及使用者所屬的任何角色。A principal object represents the user's security context, including that user's identity and any roles to which the user belongs. 對於 Windows 應用程式，這個屬性會提供相同的功能屬性。For Windows applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property. Web 應用程式，這個屬性會提供相同的功能屬性所傳回的物件屬性。For Web applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property of the object returned by the property. > [!NOTE] > 對於 Windows 應用程式中，只有專案建置**Windows 應用程式**範本初始化`My.User`預設物件。For Windows applications, only projects built on the **Windows Application** template initialize the `My.User` object by default. 在其他所有的 Windows 專案類型，您必須初始化`My.User`藉由呼叫物件方法明確或指派值給。In all other Windows project types, you must initialize the `My.User` object by calling the method explicitly or by assigning a value to . > [!NOTE] > `My.User`物件無法報告目前的 Windows 使用者，因為這些作業系統不支援登入之使用者的概念，當執行在 Windows 95 及 Windows 98 的相關資訊。The `My.User` object cannot report information about the current Windows user when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not support the concept of a logged-on user. 您必須實作自訂驗證，才能使用`My.User`這些作業系統上的物件。You must implement custom authentication to use the `My.User` object on those operating systems. ## Examples 這個範例會檢查應用程式是否使用 Windows 或自訂驗證，並使用該資訊來剖析`My.User.Name`屬性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公開屬性和方法所`My.User`物件提供存取目前使用者相關資訊。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to information about the current user.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Principal::IPrincipal ^ CurrentPrincipal { System::Security::Principal::IPrincipal ^ get(); void set(System::Security::Principal::IPrincipal ^ value); };
member this.CurrentPrincipal : System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前主體 (以角色為基礎的安全性之用)。

span.span: Gets or sets the current principal (for role-based security).
A value representing the security context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定`My.User.CurrentPrincipal`要實作的物件屬性介面以啟用自訂驗證。You can set the `My.User.CurrentPrincipal` property to an object that implements the interface to enable custom authentication. 在大部分的專案類型，這個屬性會取得並設定執行緒的目前主體。In most project types, this property gets and sets the thread's current principal. ASP.NET 應用程式中，這個屬性會取得及設定目前 HTTP 要求的使用者身分識別的安全性資訊。In an ASP.NET application, this property gets and sets the security information for the current HTTP request's user identity. 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 這個範例會檢查應用程式是否使用 Windows 或自訂驗證，並使用該資訊來剖析`My.User.Name`屬性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有設定主體的必要權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the permission required to set the principal.

permission.span: 描述一組套用至程式碼的安全性權限。

span.span: Describes a set of security permissions applied to code.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void InitializeWithWindowsUser() cil managed

summary.span: 將執行緒的目前主體設為啟動應用程式的 Windows 使用者。

span.span: Sets the thread's current principal to the Windows user that started the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser`設為 啟動應用程式的 Windows 使用者執行緒的目前主體的方法。You can use the `My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser` method to set the thread's current principal to the Windows user that started the application. Visual Basic 應用程式模型中的 Windows 應用程式啟動時呼叫這個方法，根據預設。The Visual Basic Application Model in a Windows application calls this method at startup by default. 在其他專案類型，您必須設定執行緒的目前主體呼叫這個方法明確或指派值給。In other project types, you must set the thread's current principal by calling this method explicitly or by assigning a value to . 在 Windows 專案中，`My.User`物件以執行緒的目前主體為基礎; 因此，這個方法可以變更的資訊`My.User`傳回。In Windows projects, the `My.User` object is based on the thread's current principal; therefore, this method can change the information `My.User` returns. ASP.NET 應用程式中，`My.User`物件根據目前的 HTTP 要求的使用者身分識別，而且是由這個方法不會受到影響。In an ASP.NET application, the `My.User` object is based on the current HTTP request's user identity, and is unaffected by this method. > [!NOTE] > 確切的行為`My.User`物件取決於應用程式的類型以及應用程式執行所在的作業系統。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**|

summary.span: 取得或設定 Principal 物件，表示目前使用者。

span.span: Gets or sets the principal object representing the current user.

value.span: 物件，代表目前的使用者。

span.span: An object representing the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在物件，此屬性包裝屬性。In the object, this property wraps the property. 覆寫此方法以提供不同的行為在衍生類別中。Override this method in a derived class to provide different behavior. 例如，屬性會覆寫這個屬性。For example, the property overrides this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsAuthenticated As Boolean
public: property bool IsAuthenticated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示使用者是否已經驗證。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has been authenticated.

value.span: 如果使用者已驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsAuthenticated`屬性可讓您判斷目前的使用者是否已驗證的程式碼。The `My.User.IsAuthenticated` property allows your code to determine if the current user has been authenticated. > [!NOTE] > 確切的行為`My.User`物件取決於應用程式類型和執行應用程式的作業系統。The exact behavior of `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此範例中，確認已存取資源之前驗證使用者。This example verifies that the user has been authenticated before accessing a resource. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 判斷目前的使用者是否屬於指定的角色。

span.span: Determines whether the current user belongs to the specified role.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool IsInRole(valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.BuiltInRole role) cil managed
Public Function IsInRole (role As BuiltInRole) As Boolean

param.name: role
param.span: 要檢查其成員資格的內建 Windows 角色。

span.span: The built-in Windows role for which to check membership.

summary.span: 判斷目前的使用者是否屬於指定的角色。

span.span: Determines whether the current user belongs to the specified role.

returns.span: 如果目前使用者是指定角色的成員則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current user is a member of the specified role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsInRole`方法可讓您的程式碼，判斷目前使用者是否為指定之角色的成員。The `My.User.IsInRole` method allows your code to determine if the current user is a member of the specified role. 多載`My.User.IsInRole`方法可接受 string 提供簡易存取目前主體的方法。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a string provides easy access to the method of the current principal. 多載`My.User.IsInRole`採用方法`BuiltInRole`列舉型別行為方式，會根據目前的主體。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a `BuiltInRole` enumeration behaves differently, depending on the current principal. 如果是 Windows 使用者主體 ()，此函式會將轉換`role`對等列舉型別，並傳回呼叫。If it is a Windows user principal (), this function converts `role` to the equivalent enumeration and returns the result of calling . 如果目前的主體為任何其他主體，此函式會將傳遞中列舉值的名稱`role`主體方法。If the current principal is any other principal, this function passes the name of the enumeration value in `role` to the principal's method. > [!NOTE] > 確切的行為`My.User`物件取決於應用程式類型和執行應用程式的作業系統。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 這個範例會檢查使用者是否為系統管理員才能存取資源。This example checks if the user is an administrator before accessing a resource. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsInRole`方法可讓您的程式碼，判斷目前使用者是否為指定之角色的成員。The `My.User.IsInRole` method allows your code to determine if the current user is a member of the specified role. 多載`My.User.IsInRole`方法可接受 string 提供簡易存取目前主體的方法。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a string provides easy access to the method of the current principal. 多載`My.User.IsInRole`採用方法`BuiltInRole`列舉型別行為方式，會根據目前的主體。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a `BuiltInRole` enumeration behaves differently, depending on the current principal. 如果是 Windows 使用者主體 ()，此函式會將轉換`role`對等列舉型別，並傳回呼叫。If it is a Windows user principal (), this function converts `role` to the equivalent enumeration and returns the result of calling . 如果目前的主體為任何其他主體，此函式會將傳遞中列舉值的名稱`role`主體方法。If the current principal is any other principal, this function passes the name of the enumeration value in `role` to the principal's method. > [!NOTE] > 確切的行為`My.User`物件取決於應用程式類型和執行應用程式的作業系統。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 這個範例會檢查使用者是否為系統管理員才能存取資源。This example checks if the user is an administrator before accessing a resource. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前使用者的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the current user.
The name of the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`My.User`物件來取得目前使用者的相關資訊。You can use the `My.User` object to get information about the current user. 驗證使用者的主體也會控制使用者名稱的格式。The principal that authenticates the user also controls the format of the user name. 根據預設，應用程式使用 Windows 驗證，且使用者名稱格式為網域 \ 使用者名稱。By default, an application uses Windows authentication, and the user name has the format DOMAIN\USERNAME. 主體的自訂實作不一定會使用相同的格式。A custom implementation of the principal does not necessarily use the same format. > [!NOTE] > `My.User.Name`屬性會傳回空字串，因為這些作業系統無法辨識的使用者名稱，當執行 Windows 95 和 Windows 98 底下。The `My.User.Name` property returns an empty string when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not recognize user names. > [!NOTE] > 確切的行為`My.User`物件取決於應用程式類型和執行應用程式的作業系統。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 這個範例會檢查應用程式是否使用 Windows 或自訂驗證，並使用該資訊來剖析`My.User.Name`屬性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
